His best known works were Les Tuniques Bleues, Agent 212 and Les Femmes en Blanc. In May 2021, Cauvin said he was diagnosed with terminal stomach cancer.Raoul Cauvin, the screenwriter of the Tuniques Bleues, announces that he suffers from an incurable disease He died from the disease on 19 August 2021 in Brussels, Belgium at the age of 82.Merci Raoul, et bonne route... ==References== Category:1938 births Category:2021 deaths Category:Belgian writers Category:Comics writers Category:Deaths from stomach cancer
